course.subject: LIFS
course.name: Immunobiology
course.description: Cellular, biochemical and genetic basis of immunity; cells in immune response, antigens and antigen recognition; antibodies and the generation of diversity; major histocompatibility complex; cell mediated immune response; regulation of immune response; autoimmunity, tissue transplantation and rejection. For students in their fourth year of study.
course.prerequisites: (LIFS 2040 OR 2210) AND LIFS 3140
